## StrictOmit type

Strict version of Omit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type StrictOmit<T, K extends Keys<T>> = {
  [P in keyof T as P extends StrictExclude<
    Keys<T>,
    OtherToString<K> extends infer V
      ? [V] extends [Keys<T>]
        ? V
        : never
      : never
  >
    ? P
    : never]: T[P]
}
```
**References:** [Keys](./types-kit.keys.md)<!-- -->, [StrictExclude](./types-kit.strictexclude.md)<!-- -->, [OtherToString](./types-kit.othertostring.md)

## Example


```ts
interface Props = { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 }
// Expect: { b: 2, c: 3  }
type PropValue = StrictOmit<Props, 'a'>
```
